news.h: Crest Capital Celebrates 30+ Years in Equipment Financing
news.d: Crest Capital marked three decades as one of the nation's leading equipment finance companies, serving SMBs nationwide.

news.h: Crest Capital Rated #1 Equipment Financing Nationally
news.d: Crest Capital recognized as a top-rated equipment financing provider with A+ BBB rating and Section 179 tax deduction support.

hooks: Ex-GE Capital, US Bank, TCF Bank

news.h: Honour Capital Team Joins Forces with Dext Capital
news.d: Dext Capital acquired Honour Capital's equipment finance team to expand its capabilities across industries.

news.h: Dext Capital Upsizes Investment-Grade Corporate Note
news.d: Proceeds from the upsized note used to fund new originations and growth initiatives, with Brean Capital as exclusive advisor.

news.h: Dext Capital Claims Leading Market Share in Medical Equipment
news.d: With $298.3M in assets and 11%+ expansion, Dext Capital secured leading market share in healthcare equipment finance.

news.h: Eastern Funding Promotes Nancy Robles to CEO
news.d: Long-planned leadership transition with founder Michael Fanger stepping back to focus on mentoring and relationships.

news.h: Eastern Funding Hires Falencia Prime as COO
news.d: Falencia Prime, a 30-year banking veteran and ex-Pitney Bowes director, joins to oversee operations, tech, and compliance.

news.h: Nancy Robles Recognized as 2025 Champion of Inclusivity
news.d: Robles honored for her leadership in diversity and inclusion within the equipment finance industry.

news.h: Everest Business Funding Earns 2025 Best and Brightest Workplace
news.d: Back-to-back national recognition for outstanding workplace culture, employee growth, and collaboration.

news.h: Everest Business Funding Named 2024 Best and Brightest Company
news.d: Named one of the Best and Brightest Companies to Work For in the Nation by the National Association for Business Resources.

news.h: Everest Business Funding Recognized as Leader in Alternative Financing
news.d: Company recognized for leadership in revenue-based alternative financing for small businesses.

news.h: Everlasting Capital Founders Launch Equipment Finance Training Platform
news.d: Josh Feinberg and Will Murphy developed Equipment Broker School, an online training platform for equipment finance and leasing.

news.h: Express Capital Funding Launches Customized Funding Solutions for SMBs
news.d: Anaheim-based direct lender launched tailored funding solutions for small to medium-sized businesses with same-day approvals.

news.h: Flexibility Capital Named 2024 Inc. 5000 Honoree
news.d: Ranked #92 in Financial Services and #1513 overall on the Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies.

news.h: Flexibility Capital Celebrates 1,000 Trustpilot Reviews
news.d: Achieved a 4.9 out of 5 Trustscore with 1,000+ reviews, reinforcing its position as a leader in alternative business financing.

news.h: Flexibility Capital Returns to Inc. 5000 in 2025
news.d: Ranked #3034 with 134% three-year growth, marking its second consecutive appearance on the list.

news.h: Good Funding Secures $20M Revolving Credit Facility
news.d: Closed on a $20M senior revolving credit facility with option to increase to $30M, with Brean Capital as exclusive advisor.

news.h: Idea Financial Secures $20M Corporate Term Loan from EverBank
news.d: Strategic loan to accelerate growth in small business lending and legal financing through its LevelEsq platform.

news.h: Idea Financial Surpasses $1 Billion in Total Funding Originated
news.d: Company milestone demonstrating rapid growth since founding in 2017, offering lines of credit and litigation financing.

news.h: NRS Partners with DoorDash for Nationwide Retail Integration
news.d: Strategic partnership leveraging DoorDash's retail APIs to strengthen small independent retailers, starting with liquor retailers.

news.h: NRS Partners with NationsBenefits for OTC Card Acceptance
news.d: Partnership enables NRS merchants to accept NationsBenefits OTC Flex Card, driving health plan members into independent stores.

news.h: NRS Wins 2025 Visionary Spotlight Award
news.d: National Retail Solutions recognized for Best Emerging Technology Breakthrough with its POS network serving thousands of retailers.

hooks: Indiana U grad, UIC law degree

news.h: TBF Financial Publishes 2026 Market Outlook on Private Equity and Debt
news.d: TBF is optimistic about opportunities in 2026, citing increased activity across commercial lending and strong potential for growth.

news.h: TBF Sponsors ELFA Convention 2025
news.d: TBF Financial, the leading purchaser of non-performing commercial accounts, sponsors the annual equipment finance industry event.

news.h: NY Attorney General Files Lawsuit Against Thryve Capital/Fundry
news.d: New York AG filed lawsuit against multiple MCA lenders including Fundry and Thryve Capital Funding over lending practices.

news.h: NY AG Discharges 1,100 MCA Judgments Including Thryve Capital
news.d: New York Attorney General discharged merchant cash advance judgments against small businesses, with Thryve among defendants.

hooks: Also Managing Partner at K20 Fund

news.h: Finstro Signals US Market Launch for B2B Trade Credit Platform
news.d: Australian fintech targeting the $26 trillion US B2B market with technology-driven trade credit and payment solutions.

news.h: Finstro Surpasses AUD $1 Billion in Capital Provided to SMBs
news.d: Company milestone after supporting over 7,000 small businesses since founding in 2014.

news.h: Finstro Faces Leadership Uncertainty After US Backer Push
news.d: NBH Corporation, a major US investor, pushed for cost savings after investing $20M, creating uncertainty for the Australian lender.

leaders.t: Head of Investment Banking & Capital Markets

news.h: SmartBiz Acquires Centrust Bank, Becomes a Federally Chartered Bank
news.d: First fintech to become a bank during Trump's second term, approved by the Fed and OCC to form SmartBiz Bank N.A.

news.h: SmartBiz Bank Announces Official Board and Management Structure
news.d: Evan Singer continues as CEO and Chair, Gerard Buccino named President following the Centrust Bank acquisition.

news.h: SmartBiz Bank Releases First State of Small Business Industry Pulse
news.d: Leveraging 15 years working with small businesses, SmartBiz gathered customer perspectives on business owner concerns.

news.h: NY Attorney General Announces $1 Billion Settlement with Yellowstone Capital
news.d: Largest consumer settlement by NY AG cancels $534M in small business debts; Stern and Reece permanently banned from MCA industry.

news.h: Yellowstone Capital Pays $9.8M to Settle FTC Complaint
news.d: FTC charged Yellowstone with taking money from business accounts without permission and deceiving businesses about financing terms.

news.h: NY AG Files Lawsuit Against Yellowstone for Predatory Lending
news.d: Investigation found Yellowstone exploited small businesses with fraudulent loans at interest rates up to 820% per year.
